    // Errors
    x = 1;
    ~

    ~

    ~

      ~

      ~
!!! error TS2588: Cannot assign to 'x' because it is a constant.

        ~
!!! error TS2588: Cannot assign to 'x' because it is a constant.

    var a = x + 1;
